doc.name: DocBuilderTableau
doc.description:
A tableau representing a documentation builder.

The constructor of this class creates the window. The text window itself is an instance of DocBuilderGUI, and can be accessed using the getFrame() method. As with other tableaux, this is an entity that is contained by an effigy of a model. There can be any number of instances of this class in an effigy.
doc.author: Christopher Brooks
